Ramhorn:

Ramhorn ducked under the ice beam.  "That Suukie freak murdered a defenseless 
Stinkbomb, and when I was attacking Suukie in self defense, she helped him 
escape!"
Raising his missile launcher, he fired a rocket at Dracona's pelvis, and 25 
sonic shells at Plintissa's chest.
